text:
@RahulGandhi What extra support has Modi Sarkar provided farmers during the harvesting season under lockdown?
The 7,384 crore under PM Kisan was due anyway in April, and is NOT a relief package for farmers, for Corona lockdown.
#Covid19 
https://t.co/ED9Vbv1baW
